| and Sully Erna Certification = Chart position =
}} 'Hollow' is an acoustic song by the Heavy metal band Godsmack from their
fourth studio album, [[IV (Godsmack album)|IV]]. Frontman Sully Erna and Lisa
Guyer are on the song vocals. "Hollow" is the only acoustic song that appeared
in the album, and Erna has played it frequently on his solo tour.
